knimeNode.name: QVX Reader
knimeNode.shortDescription: Reads different QVX file formats and converts them into a readable table format with a two-dimensional array

intro.p: Reads qvx files from local file system or online. Upon execution, the node will read the table header information and output the data into a KNIME data table.

fullDescription.option: Enter the file location or the url path of the qvx file to read it into the workflow

ports.outPort: KNIME table reads different field attributes from a .qvx file.
